name: MGF1ParameterSpec
comment:
This class specifies the set of parameters used with mask generation function MGF1 in OAEP Padding and RSA-PSS signature scheme, as defined in the PKCS #1 v2.1 standard.

Its ASN.1 definition in PKCS#1 standard is described below: 

 MGF1Parameters ::= OAEP-PSSDigestAlgorthms
where 
 OAEP-PSSDigestAlgorithms    ALGORITHM-IDENTIFIER ::= {
   { OID id-sha1 PARAMETERS NULL   }|
   { OID id-sha224 PARAMETERS NULL   }|
   { OID id-sha256 PARAMETERS NULL }|
   { OID id-sha384 PARAMETERS NULL }|
   { OID id-sha512 PARAMETERS NULL },
   ...  -- Allows for future expansion --
 }

constructors.name: MGF1ParameterSpec
constructors.comment:
Constructs a parameter set for mask generation function MGF1
 as defined in the PKCS #1 standard.

fields.name: SHA1
fields.comment: The MGF1ParameterSpec which uses "SHA-1" message digest.

fields.name: SHA224
fields.comment: The MGF1ParameterSpec which uses "SHA-224" message digest.

fields.name: SHA256
fields.comment: The MGF1ParameterSpec which uses "SHA-256" message digest.

fields.name: SHA384
fields.comment: The MGF1ParameterSpec which uses "SHA-384" message digest.

fields.name: SHA512
fields.comment: The MGF1ParameterSpec which uses SHA-512 message digest.

methods.name: getDigestAlgorithm
methods.comment:
Returns the algorithm name of the message digest used by the mask
 generation function.
